fileDescription: Strings for the 'Drop Shadow' effect - adds customizable drop shadows with color controls and blur quality.

xhxiaiein_effect_dropshadow.name: Drop Shadow
xhxiaiein_effect_dropshadow.description: Create a drop shadow with color controls and blur.

distance.name: Distance
distance.desc: Distance of the shadow from the object.

angle.name: Angle
angle.desc: Angle of the shadow in degrees (0-360).

hue.name: Hue
hue.desc: Hue adjustment for shadow color (0-360 degrees).

blurquality.name: Blur quality
blurquality.desc: Blur sampling quality. Low: faster, High: smoother, but more performance-intensive. Recommended value is 30%.
